channel.title: Runeage help plz
channel.description:
hello i have the source/client of runeag
it's currently all going well online and stuff with some nice players.
but 1 thing that's anyoing every 1 is Godswords
1. stab is fine 2.lunge kicks? 3.block hits weird. 4.kicks
Does any1 kno how i can change the Gfx's of the godsword so they all hit?
this is runeage source/client
474 i think :/
when u open sorce it's like this
Bin data deps src.....
Thankyou for your help if u help :)
